getMilestoneId().Description: Retrieves the ID of this milestone.

getState().Description: Retrieves the state of the milestone - one of @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#STATE_COMPLETED_NOT_CLAIMED_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#STATE_CLAIMED_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#STATE_NOT_COMPLETED_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#STATE_NOT_STARTED_E@.

getCompletionRewardData().Description: Retrieves the completion reward data for this milestone.

Returns: The ID of the @B_com#google#android#gms#games#event#Event_E@ associated with this milestone.
getEventId().Description: Retrieve the ID of the associated event. Increments to this event will increase the user's progress toward this milestone when the milestone is in the @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#STATE_NOT_COMPLETED_E@ state.

Returns: The number of increments required to complete the milestone.
getTargetProgress().Description: Retrieves the number of increments of the event associated with the milestone @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#getEventId_E@ required to complete the milestone.

Returns: An indicator of progress through the milestone.
getCurrentProgress().Description: Retrieves the current progress of @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#getTargetProgress_E@ required to complete the milestone. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#STATE_CLAIMED_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#STATE_COMPLETED_NOT_CLAIMED_E@ the value of @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#getTargetProgress_E@ is returned. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#STATE_NOT_COMPLETED_E@ the return value is the number of increments to the event @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#getEventId_E@ associated with the milestone that have occurred since the quest was accepted. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#quest#Milestone#STATE_NOT_STARTED_E@ the return value is 0.

ClassDesc: Data interface for retrieving milestone information.
